lead_paragraph: Asafa Powell of Jamaica has run five of the fastest eight times in the 100 meters, including a world-record 9.74 seconds, set in September 2007 in a heat at the Rieti Grand Prix in Italy.
snippet: Asafa Powell of Jamaica has run five of the fastest eight times in the 100 meters, including a world-record 9.74 seconds, set in September 2007 in a heat at the Rieti Grand Prix in Italy.
